Talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Look how happy our conductor is.<sp:0:4:0>His enthusiasm is infectious. It inspires
me to play my best.<sp:0:4:0>He really loves the arts, and he's a
staunch supporter of our troupe.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Though as you can see, his melodic sense is, well...<sp:5:1:0>
None of us pay much attention to his conducting.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><sp:0:2:2:6400>It was our conductor who established the
troupe to brighten up the lives of people
who came to the stables.<sp:0:4:0>He traveled the whole world searching
for musicians. We wouldn't be here
without him.<sp:0:4:0>For that, and for being a joy in so many
people's lives, we'll stick with him all
the way.
Talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I know what you're thinking.<sp:0:4:0>How can a man who flails his baton
around at random be a conductor?<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>And I'll grant you that he has absolutely no
melodic sense.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0700>It was our conductor's grandfather who
built this stable to begin with, you see.<sp:0:4:0>He was raised from a young age with
the importance of being a light in
people's lives.<sp:0:4:0>When he realized that people and animals
alike can enjoy music, he decided to form
a musical troupe.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>I know he looks a little outlandish, but he
comes through when it counts.
Talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Well...<sp:5:1:0>there aren't any rules against this
kind of behavior, I suppose, but...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Aren't you embarrassed to be strutting
around in virtually nothing?
Talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>As I recall, you and I first met at
Woodland Stable, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>We didn't know each other, and yet you
went out of your way to help us. I think
about that often.<sp:0:4:0>The next time we need to travel a long
distance, you'd be my first choice for
our driver.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS_01>I hope that all of us in the Stable
Trotters—I mean, the Stable Heroes—
can count on you for years to come.
Talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now that the troupe is back together,
we've been performing nonstop. Our
conductor is elated!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>And truth to tell, he's not the only one.<sp:5:1:0>
I'd forgotten how it felt for us all to play
together as a band.<sp:0:4:0>It's so much fun!<sp:0:4:0>Playing my chosen instrument in my
favorite place with my dearest friends...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I owe a lot to you for the chance to do
what I love most again.
